channel.title: lax on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lax on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Airport on time
item.description: 06:40 Tuesday 26 January 2016 PST Security theater required me to discard new, sealed, branded, small plastic drink containers because they were “more than 2.5 ounces.” I chugged them, spilling a bit of the second one on the floor in my petty, foolish, wasted, little act of defiance against Chertov and the warmongering punks who sell the idea that 9⁄11 was perpetrated by people living in a cave. I still got a bomb, three hatchets, sarin gas containers, a katana, a cactus, and a 44 Magnum through the security gate.

item.title: in LAX
item.description: 12:12 Friday 22 January 2016 PST About 40 minutes before our flight, and I’m charging my computer a little bit away from our gate because I’m addicted to my computer (and therefore it having power) and don’t know if I can get a power fix closer to the gate. In line at the deli kiosk thing where we grabbed some foodage, We saw the cabin attendant who gave me slippers.
